    mad r0.xyz, c6, v1.x, r0
    mad r0.xyz, c8, v1.z, r0
    mad r0.xyz, c9, v1.w, r0

    dp3 o5.z, -r5, r3
    mul o6.xyz, r3, c15.w
    mul r3.xyz, r0.zxyw, -r5.yzxw

    mul r0.yw, r0.y, c7.xxzz
    mad r0.xy, c6.xzzw, r0.x, r0.ywzw
    mad r0.xy, c8.xzzw, r0.z, r0
    mov r2.z, r0.x
    mov o1.y, r0.y
